overview:
Cara is the Public Relations Director at Appular in New York City.

Cara has held several positions in the field of media including radio host, newspaper and social magazine columnist, PR director, club and party promoter and even political events consultant. Cara holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in Communications/Public Relations from the University of Houston and an Associates in Journalism and Media Studies. She has been an active writer for several social magazines, social networks and blogs since 1999 and is also proficient in writing/speaking French.
